Name: market for propylene oxide, liquid | propylene oxide, liquid | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/18202/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'propylene oxide, liquid', in the Global geography.;This product is generally considered to be used at the production site. Therefore, the market does not contain any transport or losses.;propylene oxide, liquid'  is an organic substance with a CAS no. : 000075-56-9. It is called '2-methyloxirane' under IUPAC naming and its molecular formula is: C3H6O. It is liquid under normal conditions of temperature and pressure with a benzene-like odour. The substance is modelled as a pure substance. On a consumer level, is used in the following products: hydraulic fluids, lubricants and greases, adhesives and sealants, anti-freeze products, coating products, fillers, putties, plasters, modelling clay, finger paints and heat transfer fluids. There is no publicly available information about the consumption of this substance on industrial sites.

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce propylene oxide, liquid within the geography of this dataset, with the product ready to be used.

This activity ends with the supply of 1 kg of propylene oxide, liquid to the consumers of this product. Transport is not included as this product is generally considered to be used at the production site. No product losses are included.
